page.title: 02Waking Up
page.content: I wake up at about seven thirty. I either wake up on my own or dad wakes me up. I have a bedroom to myself. It's a small one but it's cosy. I've got a single bed, one cupboard, a small armchair that I upholstered (repaired) and varnished. It is usually tidy. I shall explain about my house. It's an old pub called Rose and Crown in a small village called Dinnington. It's quite a big building. I usually lie in bed and grumble before I get up. I wear pyjamas in bed. These are a sort of trousers and jacket. Then I go to the bathroom and have a wash and brush my teeth. Then I get dressed. First I put on my socks and pants then I put on my trousers, shirt, tie and jumper then I put on my shoes and brush my hair.
